a.xlink:title: Calculate the absolute difference of the expectation value and that of a given truth value...
Process the newTasks accumulated in the previous workCycle, accept input ones and those that correspo...
The hash code of a TruthValue.
To answer a question by existing beliefs.
Evaluate the quality of the judgment as a solution to a problem.
Evaluate the quality of a revision, then de-prioritize the premises.
Update a belief.
Belief revision.
To accept a new judgment as isBelief, and check for revisions and solutions.
The task and belief have the same content.
Directly process a new task.
Immediate processing of a new task, in constant time Local processing, in one concept only...
Select a novel task to process.
An atomic working workCycle of the system: process new Tasks, then fire a concept.
A clock tick.
Run to completion: repeatedly execute NARS working cycle, until Inputs are Finished, or 1000 steps.
non-static equivalent to main(String[]) : run to completion from an input file
The entry point of the standalone application.
Entry point of the inference engine.
An atomic step in a concept, only called in Memory# processConcept.
Select a concept to fire.
To produce the hashcode of a sentence.
Evaluate a query against beliefs (and desires in the future)
Evaluate the quality of a belief as a solution to a problem, then reward the belief and de-prioritize...
Check if a Sentence provide a better answer to a Question or Goal.
